name: Nocturnal Nightclub
description:
This game is a tower defense game in which you must prevent supernatural creatures from leaving the Nocturnal Nightclub. However, each tower's effects interact with other tower's effects to either damage or buff different enemy types.

Team members: Arjun Kurkal, Alexander Nuccitelli, Joseph Nuccitelli, and Jenna Plute.

Original Musical Score and Art.
